title: Perma 00FPS + 300MS
body:
So, I just had a game, I was permanantly stuck on 00FPS (as the title states) and with a ping of 200-300 (again, as the title says).

The issue here is that I had just played god knows how many games I had with 0 issue, but it had just started that game. 
Nothing had changed. Nothing gone, nothing added, nothing changed. 

Not sure on what to do.

(If the people I played with see this, just wanna say sorry, didn't know it was gonna happen and was outta my control)

replies.body:
Regrettably, the hardest kind of issue to nail down.

Your best bet is going to be taking note of any relevant info (game, PC and connection-specific) you can think of and then comparing it if it happens again.

It could just be a freak accident, they do happen. It's usually a PC hitch in those cases but connections can do that too.

For now, you could run a proactive client repair, but unless it happens again or you are noticing issues in other games/programs, I wouldn't get too worried about a once-off issue.
